XTextDocument.BodyText:
General Information Name: Sex: Age: Occupation: Ethnicity: Native Place: Marital Status: Education: Address: Time of data collection: Processing at admission: □skin cleaning, □change clothes, □trimming nails,□no disposal Admission manner: □walking■being supported ■wheelchair, stretcher □being carried on the back Admission introduction: □admission guide □disease education □diet □routine □visit and chaperonage □hygiene □materials management □security protection Medical diagnosis at admission: Grade 1 hypertension (of high risk) Allergy history: ○with○without(medicine: food: others:) Family history: □with □without (□hypertension □coronary disease □diabetes mellitus □mental disease, □tumor □heredity or others)
Level of life and self-care Dietary habit: □rice and flour □high protein □high carbohydrate □high fat □vegetarian diet □dietary bias □dietetic restraint □other Appetite: □normal, □hyperfunction for () days □loss for () days □loss of appetite for () days Bradymasesis: □without □with (cause(s):) Dysphagia: □without or □with (cause(s):) Sleep:□normal□difficulty in falling asleep ■restless sleep □dreaminess □insomnia Sleep aid: □none, □drug, □other Excretion: excrement: □normal, □constipation (1 time/ days), □diarrhea (1 time/ days), □incontinence or other Urination: ( times/day), color: , □urinary tract interruption, □frequent micturition, □urgent urination, □odynuria, □retention catheterization or other Self-care ability: □full, □disabled (needing to be coordinated) Activity: □off-bed activity, ○sit on chair○lie in bed (turn over by oneself or with aid from others) Health consciousness: ○good○ordinary○poor (causes) smoking: ○yes○no Drinking: ○yes○no○other
Mentality and society Mental state: ○calm○sad○excitable○anxious○fear○lonely○depressed○euphoria○adiaphoria Sociability: ○willing to communicate with others○unwilling to communicate with others Hospitalization concerns: ○with○without (○financial○problem○self-care ability○role change□others)
Nursing experience: Consciousness: ○clear minded○absent-minded○coma Expression: ○normal○indifferent○miserable Pupil: ○equal size○unequal size (left, right), diffused Miotic light reflex: ○existinexisting○slow○disappearing Global nutritional status: ○good○medium○poor○fat○thin○cachexia Skin and mucosa: ○normal○abnormal Bedsore: ○I○II○III location /scope Function of the five sense organs: ○normal○blind (left, right)○deaf (left, right)○aphasia Mouth: ○normal○ulcer○pseudomembrane○eruption Tongue: ○normal○skewed○tremor Gingivae: ○normal○red and swollen○bleeding○ulcer Tooth: ○denture○tooth loss○normal Various catheters: Wound: Others:
